topic.body:
https://www.datalounge.com/thread/12999677-top-uk-mohel-offers-to-circumcise-royal-baby
http://www.thejc.com/news/uk-news/109723/bring-me-royal-baby-and-i%E2%80%99ll-give-him-snip-says-top-mohel
http://www.thejc.com/news/uk-news/109683/peres-sends-gift-royal-baby
Rabbi Laura Janner- Klausner said
"May he inherit the Queen's qualities of dignity, decency and hard work.”
Israeli President Shimon Peres sent the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge an outfit with “From Israel with love” printed on the shirt. 
How is a traditional Jewish circumcising ?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gi0POZQuxzY
topic.title: The English Royals gave their child to a Jewish rabbi to be circumcised and sucked in penis according to traditional Jewish circumcision ritual. Israels president Simon Peres and other Jewish leaders congratulated the future king and queen for their wise decision. They say that giving a baby to be blood-sucked in the penis by a Jew is a sign of decency.
